name: Paintify - Secret Garden For Kids
description:
Paintify allows you to create beautiful images by filling your favourite colours in it. You can instantly share your creativity via social media options.

Kids always like to fill colors in pictures. So, we are introducing “Paintify” application for kids who love to paint pictures. This app will helpful to make beautiful images with your favourite colours.

Paintify allows your kids to colour various images from multiple categories. Your kid will be able to play with a plenty of colours and create excellent cute images. You can share creativity of your child on various social media easily.
